## Introduction

This is an attempt to map CS-PHOC dataset as a Survey use case of the [new data model](https://www.gbif.org/composition/HjlTr705BctcnaZkcjRJq/gbif-new-data-model) to DwCAv2 and explore what information can be retrieve from DwCAv2.
